annonstext:
About Poster Store And Our Culture

Poster Store is an e-commerce B2C company, selling beautiful posters and high quality frames online. 

We are a young startup with 70 employees between 20-40 years. The company was founded in 2016 and started its journey in Stockholm, Sweden but is now active over 30 countries. The company is rapidly growing and every year has brought new big steps forward in our development. The company culture is shaped by motivated employees that strive every day to be the best in the world with everything they do. If you wish to learn from the best, grow, create great value and become the best Digital Marketing Analyst in the world - then Poster Store is the right company for you. We are data driven, continuously improve our way of working, always analyze and evaluate all new data to use for the next iteration of improvement.

About the role

For our Paid Social Marketing we search for someone with practical experience in digital analysis who enjoys thinking strategically with data, and always has one eye on the bigger picture. Knowledge of and a keen enthusiasm for running experiments and identifying insights from data is a must as well as proven experience in managing large datasets.

Duties & Responsibilities

	Running and ensuring a successful outcome of our Facebook campaigns on a daily basis.
	Following up closely and making necessary changes to always ensure highest profitability.
	Proactively identifying opportunities and making recommendations to improve campaigns effectiveness and bringing the system to the next level by developing analytical systems and executing A/B tests independently.
	Testing and analyzing the potential of paid advertisement for further SoMe platforms such as Pinterest, Tiktok, Snapchat.
	Producing and presenting regular reports which include results and recommendations to the Head of Marketing and the Board.

Requirements & Qualifications

	Marketing or Business degree and/or 12+ months experience running digital marketing campaigns.
	Possess and demonstrate strong analytical, critical thinking and research skills.
	Ability to work on numerous concurrent projects, with attention to deadlines.
	Self-motivated, positive personality with excellent interpersonal skills.
	Willingness to learn and conduct independent research.
	Ability to work collaboratively in a fun, fast-paced, and dynamic team environment. 
	Fluent in English.

Salary

Compensation includes a competitive salary. Salary is set individually depending on previous work and educational experience. No relocation assistance available. 

Extras that come with the role

	Paddle or Crossfit during working hours each week.
	Monthly after works.
	2-3 times corporate big events per year (such as go-kart driving, VR gaming, Christmas dinner).

Location

Our office is centrally located at Birger Jarlsgatan 41a, Stockholm.
